summary:
A mysterious figure in the dark with luminous eyes whispers the sweetest words to you;
Go below The Lover Stone to find a forgotten secret built inside the mountain next to a waterfall, The Lover's Comfort, an ancient temple of Dibella long forgotten.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Update: The Lover's Comfort version 0.2 is here.[/b] Adds another floor with inner sanctum (no loading screen). Also some additional adjustments to the interior with lights and other stuff.

Lore-friendly mod that wish too enrich one little spot in Skyrim.

Story (beta™)
A mysterious figure in the dark with luminous eyes whispers the sweetest words to you;
Go below The Lover Stone to find a forgotten secret built inside the mountain next to a waterfall, The Lover's Comfort, an ancient temple of Dibella long forgotten.

[youtube]RAIG6r2yxsE[/youtube]

The Idea (beta™)
An early release, just to get feedback on location, bugs, and if there is anything interested for this lore-friendly mod that most likely will become a player home. The plan is to have someone there before you, and give it a story. But we'll see.

Try it, give your opinion and if you like the direction it goes in or wish to make any comments about what you think would be cool to add, please do.
author: DJ
